content: **crochet puppy lovey - pdf pattern download** this puppy lovey is the perfect cuddling companion for little ones the pattern is beginner-friendly with lots of description and photos but is also enjoyable for more experienced crocheters i hope you enjoy making this little kitty as much as i did finished size when complete this kitty lovey is about 10 inches tall from the top of head to the bottom of blanket when the blanket is laid flat it is about 14 inches wide materials worsted weight yarn 5 5mm hook for the lovey blanket and a 3 5mm hook for the amigurumi parts poly-fil/stuffing 10mm safety eyes embroidery thread eyelashes yarn needle for sewing on facial features pieces together and weaving in ends you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for respecting my rights as the designer and for supporting loops & love crochet * thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet this pattern and others are available for free on my blog at www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are purchasing an ad-free printable pdf version of the pattern follow on instagram www instagram com/loopsandlovecrochet like on facebook www facebook com/loopsandlovecrochet
